# ðŸš¥ Introduce

Iâ€™m designer CuriosityWen, My website was developed using Gatsby.

# ðŸš€ Getting started

1. Install [Node package manager (NPM)](https://nodejs.org/) (if you haven't already).
2. Install package `npm install` or `yarn install`
3. Start the local development server with `gatsby develop` or `npm run develop`, Browser access [http://localhost:8000](http://localhost:8000)
4. Create a production build, use `gatsby build`
5. Serve the production build of your site for testing `gatsby serve` , Browser access [http://localhost:9000](http://localhost:9000)

For more on Gatsby, visit [https://www.gatsbyjs.com](https://www.gatsbyjs.com)

# ðŸŽ› Plugins

- Content Management System: Netlify CMS | [https://www.npmjs.com/package/gatsby-plugin-netlify-cms](https://www.npmjs.com/package/gatsby-plugin-netlify-cms)
- Drag elements: React Draggable | [https://www.npmjs.com/package/react-draggable](https://www.npmjs.com/package/react-draggable)
- Easily apply tilt hover effect: React Tilt | [https://www.npmjs.com/package/react-parallax-tilt](https://www.npmjs.com/package/react-parallax-tilt)
- Rolling parallax effect: React Rellax Wrapper | [https://www.npmjs.com/package/react-rellax-wrapper](https://www.npmjs.com/package/react-rellax-wrapper)
- Random number effect: React Random Reveal | [https://www.npmjs.com/package/react-random-reveal](https://www.npmjs.com/package/react-random-reveal)
- Random card banner data: gatsby-source-airtable | [https://www.npmjs.com/package/gatsby-source-airtable](https://www.npmjs.com/package/gatsby-source-airtable)
